nodes.bodyText: The other descriptions are without the the or a prefix.
The part "in a bib file" seems superfluous in the given context.
The different supported roles should be already clear as they are the options in the dropdown field.
Just copy the text above (otherwise the user has to look at the tooltip for editortype...)
The comment from editortype concerning the options applies here as well.
"for this entry" can be removed in my opinion.
The authors are separated by and? Maybe, this can be added here?
Do we need to add "separated by ," here?
